summary: Doom is a classic video game where you play as a space marine fighting demons and undead on Mars' moons and in hell. It was made by id Software in 1993 and is known for its 3D graphics and intense action. The game was a big hit, selling millions of copies and influencing many other games. It's considered one of the best first-person shooter games ever made, with a lot of fans still playing it today. Doom started a whole series of games and even inspired movies.
title: Doom (1993 video game)
